group_1.textLeft: Did you hear? Alina Gray's work is supposed@to be on display today.

group_1.textRight: Seriously? That almost never happens!@Where's it at?

group_1.textLeft: Let me see...
It's in the cafeteria... Says here the title@is "untitled".

group_1.textRight: So, it's not in the Exhibition Hall?

group_1.textLeft: You saw Alina Gray's work, right?@What do you think it was expressing?

group_1.textRight: Well, it struck me as a complex presentation@with a surprisingly simple meaning.
All things are in constant flux, perhaps.

group_1.textLeft: Ahaha! You may be onto something there.
Rare for her to have interactive art, yeah?

group_1.textRight: If I can participate in her artwork...
I don't mind whatever it costs!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, me either.
That was my second lunch today...

group_1.textRight: Really regretting that last bite. I hope it@doesn't go to my thighs...

group_1.textCenter: (The audience is continuing to grow...@I should get a good sampling from this.)

group_1.textRight: Alina.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
Oh, Nemu.

group_1.textRight: I came too!

group_1.textLeft: You as well? Why are you both here?
I didn't think you were interested in this@topic.

group_1.textRight: Well, normally we wouldn't be. But this time@we got curious!
Yes. We wondered what action our words could@have spurred you to take.

group_1.textLeft: Huh... So what did you think?

group_1.textRight: I'm positively stuffed...

group_1.textLeft: I'm not talking about that.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* [chara:100701:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100701:cheek_0][chara:100701:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:100701:lipSynch_1]Obviously.
To see the art exhibit, you first have to eat@in the art gallery's cafeteria.
Then once you have disposed of your leftover@food and cutlery in the trash, you enter.
The guiding method is very compelling.
But there's something I didn't really get,@you know...
What was the meaning behind draping that@mannequin in all those fake furs?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm...
I guess you two don't have it.

group_1.textRight: What?!

group_1.textLeft: It's something that I, Alina, possess.

group_1.textRight: What does that mean?

group_1.textLeft: It's a secret. I am still waiting on the@results.
I want to know if there's a meaning to@what I'm doing.
That's why I'm also looking forward to the@final day of the exhibit.
